content:
Bryan Gin-ge Chen said:

Is your MacBook running Apple Silicon by any chance? E.g. is it on this list? https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT211814

If so, maybe the steps in this thread might help: https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113489-new-members/topic/M1.20macs/near/227370426

Yes I am on a Macbook Air M1. Thank you for your help, I think I have it working now! I used the steps in the linked thread along with https://www.wisdomgeek.com/development/installing-intel-based-packages-using-homebrew-on-the-m1-mac/ and then tried the whole process again from the step by step page and eventually got it working.
Michael has marked this topic as resolved.

Great to hear!

We should really add instructions to our install page for M1 Macs. If you feel up to it, you can make a pull request by clicking on the pencil icon to "Edit this file" here. Otherwise, any additional detail you can give here would be helpful.
We also should warn about this in the installer I guess. https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib-tools/issues/107

I'm afraid I have no idea how to use Github and I am not very experienced with computery things like Homebrew but I can try to give more detail if that is okay.

Basically the issue was I had the M1 version of Homebrew installed but Lean required me to use the intel version. The link I copied into my initial reply was the instructions I followed to install Homebrew again. After I did that, the command that does everything in one didn't work, so I again had to follow the step by step page. I'm afraid I can't remember how I finally got elan to work but I know I also had issues with gmp as I kept getting errors saying directory not empty; I fixed this by manually going into the folder and deleting what was in it (I know that was a bit risky!). At one of the stages I also kept getting the error Error: An unexpected error occurred during the 'brew link' step: The formula built, but is not symlinked but I fixed that using brew link.

I'm sorry this isn't enough detail to instruct others, unfortunately my understanding of Terminal and Homebrew etc is not strong enough to understand exactly what is happening at each stage, and I didn't note down what my problems were. I hope this helps anyway!
No worries, thanks for the detailed reply and happy Lean-ing!
